pageBanner.title: Unemployment Benefits
pageBanner.description: Have you lost your job? You may qualify for temporary income to support you while you look for a new one.

paragraph.text: Need some help staying on your feet while  you look for a new job? If youâ€™re out of work and able to work, you may be eligible for temporary income called unemployment insurance (UI). If you qualify, you receive weekly payments to help cover your living expenses.
